posts.post_content:
The following 1887 N172 Old Judge cards are available for sale or trade.  

In trade I would be looking for PSA graded OJ's that I do not have.

Irwin - $150 or trade 
Kloff - $110 or trade 
Boyle - $160 or trade 
Dorgan - $135 or trade 
Hanrahan - $135 or trade
Vaughn - trade or make offer (this is a rare Louisville card)
Still available... Prefer to just trade for other PSA graded OJs that I need. Grade does not matter!
